questions.question_text:
A customer wants to monitor a remote datacenter using an existing vRealize Operations Manager cluster. The round-trip time (RTT) between datacenters is 150 ms.

Which type of node should be deployed?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Remote Collector node for sure

choices.B: It is a probable solution for resolving the problem that triggered the alert.
choices.A: It updates objects or read data about objects in monitored systems.
choices.C: It is always linked to a corresponding Knowledge Base article.
choices.D: Alert recommendations are only available as part of an installed Management Pack, so creating custom recommendations is not possible.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. It is a probable solution for resolving the problem that triggered the alert.
Alert recommendations in vRealize Operations provide actionable suggestions to help resolve the issues identified by alerts. They guide administrators on the steps to take to address the underlying problems

https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.core.doc/GUID-F9AF30F3-089B-43A8-8323-F266E51C05B8.html

questions.question_text: What is a characteristic of an alert recommendation?
Which type of node can function as a NTP server for the vRealize Operations cluster when the cluster is behaving normally, and there are no errors or issues in the existing cluster?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Primary nodes
The primary node serves as the NTP server by default, ensuring that all the cluster nodes follow the same time protocol1. This helps maintain synchronized time across the cluster, which is crucial for the smooth operation of services.

https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.core.doc/GUID-97A9F105-E22F-4FC9-8631-EE99C18B355B.html

Selected Answer: B
B seems correct

comments.content: B is correct, tested in the lab

questions.question_text:
There is a planned project to move all the workloads that support a business-critical application from the company's vSphere environment, which is running in a data center, to a public cloud. The vSphere environment is being monitored by vRealize Operations, and all of the workloads supporting the critical application are members of a custom group in vRealize Operations.

The CTO has asked for an estimate of the monthly cost to run all of these workloads in IBM Cloud instead of the private cloud.

Which steps, if any, could the administrator take to obtain this information?

choices.C: What-If Analysis --> Datacenter Comparison --> Select the appropriate IBM Cloud region --> Import from existing VM --> Filter on the custom group - -> Select all machines --> Run Scenario.
choices.B: What-If Analysis --> Migration Planning --> Select the appropriate IBM Cloud region --> Import from existing VM --> Filter on the custom group --> Select all machines --> Run Scenario.
choices.D: What-If Analysis --> Import Rate Card --> upload a comma-separated value text file with IBM Cloud rates --> Import from existing VM --> Filter on the custom group --> Select all machines --> Run Scenario.
choices.A: vRealize Operations does not support IBM Cloud as a provider for public cloud migration planning scenarios.

questions.question_text:
An existing vRealize Operations user has been granted the Administrator role. The previous ReadOnly role has not been removed for the user.

What is the expected behavior when the user attempts to create a new vRealize Operations dashboard?

choices.B: The user will need DashboardManager role before the user is able to create dashboards.
choices.C: The user can create dashboard without changing any roles or permissions.
choices.D: The user cannot create dashboards until the ReadOnly role is removed.
choices.A: The user will need ContentUser role before the user is able to create dashboards.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. The user can create dashboard without changing any roles or permissions.
The Administrator role includes privileges to all features, objects, and actions in vRealize Operations, which allows the user to create dashboards regardless of the ReadOnly role.

https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.core.doc/GUID-9F316466-FACA-4DA0-8F3E-51BC73793990.html
